string-array.name: greetingstrings
string-array.item: Hi.
Sup.
Sup!
Sup, whatcha up to?
So, what\'s going on today?
Hello, how\'s your bum, er I mean mum?
Hey, how\'s it going?
I molested your keyboard...er, I mean how\'s it goin?
Bacongo, are your chickens dancing finely this day?
Greetings captain.
*sniff* *sniff* Do you smell that? Somebody smells funny.
*sniff* *sniff* I dropped my keys in the toilet:(
Hey, could you scrub my back for me, everyone else is freaked out I\'m sitting here naked in a tub of water.
Why does everyone quiet down when you come into the room?
psst, someone is trying to kill you. just an FYI.
*yawn*
biscuits and gravy, it\'s you!
hey, someone was looking for you.
Oh, you finally showed up- now we can start.
-and that\'s how I found out who the second shooter was.
-and that\'s how I found Hoffa.
Now do you believe me?
Yeah, do it. They won\'t mind.
We missed you.
I missed you- I was running out of legs to hump.
